value:
The Askran Kingdom is so beautiful.
It saddens me to hear that it is also
engulfed in conflict.

I trained as a priestess at a priory.
And before that, I lived in Ram, a
small village...$k$pBut even further back, I lived in a
castle. Keep that between us, OK?

If you get tired, please let me know. I'll
pour you some hot tea, and we'll take
a break together.

I'm going to offer a prayer to Mila.
Would you care to join me? I think
you'll find it calming. I know I do.

I was thinking about a childhood
friend of mine. For some reason, we
can never quite seem to meet up...$k$pIs it fate that keeps us apart?

Are you $Nu?
I was asked to bring you a message
from $Nf.
I have the strength to fight, too!
Hard work does bring results.
Oh... What a disappointment.

This strength that you've given me
will not go to waste.

I am Celica, a priestess. Though I'd
rather avoid bloodshed, I am
prepared to fight if I must.

There's something I'd like to speak to
you about. Will you listen to what I
have to say?$k$pAs you know, people call me Celica.
But, actually...I have another name.
My true name is Anthiese.$k$pThis is a secret I must guard closely.
If the people of Zofia were to learn of
it, it would result in a pointless war.$k$pI do feel safe telling you, though. In
fact, I want you to understand. You
matter to me. I trust you with my life.$k$pEven if I return to my world, please
remember the time we spent. Think of
me... $k$pThe girl called both Celica...and
Anthiese.
せやあっ
ええいっ
Drat!
What?!
It's over!
My apologies.
Not about to stop here!
Grant me strength!
So sorry...
Uhuhu
Oh? What is it that you need?
All right, all right...
May the goddess Mila protect us all.
I take my duties, as princess of Zofia, quite seriously.
Tell me, is there anyone in your life who is essential to you?
I wonder if Alm...is doing well?
Being here, with you, restores my spirit.
Of course.
Oh?
Let's go.
